item.description:
The 29th Annual Oktoberfest in Harvard Square
Sunday October 12, 2008 from Noon – 6 pm
Join us at Oktoberfest for dancing in the streets and in the crosswalks throughout HARVARD SQUARE!

A schedule is posted here: http://www.harvardsqu...
Sounds like lots of fun things to do and great weather for this event.
Harvard Square’s Oktoberfest features six stages of live entertainment, music, dance, art, street performers and 200+ stalls of artisans and merchants. Oktoberfest is the ultimate “taste of” event where one can sample international cuisines, festival favorites, and delicious desserts. Enjoy a view of the main stage from the Sam Adam’s/ Grafton Street Beer Garden in front of Out of Town News.

Live Music, Dance, and Street Performers
Family-Friendly Activities
Sidewalk Sales
Arts and Craft Vendors
Vintage Goods
Free Goodies
Food From All Over The World!
Authentic German Cuisine

OKTOBERFEST 2008 ENTERTAINMENT SCHEDULE: TBA

SPONSORED BY: The Boston Phoenix, Dunkin Donuts, Nantucket Nectars, Samuel Adams, Grafton Street, Newbury Comics, Club Passim, Pilgrim Parking, and Wellbridge.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of B&J between noon and 12:15. Write if you want my cell#.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley
